name: Chronobank
description:
Chronobank was founded in 2016 in Sydney, Australia with the vision of transforming the way Individuals access jobs and Businesses connect with Contractors.

As a Fintech Company focusing on HR-solutions, Chronobank reduces & eliminates the barriers to Recruitment and Payment Processes for both Workers and Employers by utilizing Blockchain Technology.

Chronobankâ€™s achievements in development range from successfully launching dApps like the LaborX.io job platform and the TimeX.io cryptocurrency exchange, up to working on its own side chain with custom consensus algorithm.
